1.text: Decide who goes first by having everyone roll a die, if desired.

2.text: Roll all 6 dice when it’s your turn.

3.text: Recognize scoring dice such as ones, fives, and three-of-a-kind.

4.text: Score 1,500 points by earning a straight or 3 pairs.

5.text: Look to see if you have scoring dice and set at least 1 aside.

6.text: Earn at least 750 points on your first turn to get “on the board.

7.text: End your turn if you don’t have any scoring dice.

8.text: Keep rolling until you're satisfied with your score or you roll with no score.

9.text: Calculate your score and pass the dice to the next person.

10.text: Choose which scoring dice to keep to put others back in the game.

11.text: Avoid taking a risk by accepting a good score.

12.text: Keep rolling your extra dice if you have a strong lead.

13.text: Win the game by earning at least 10,000 points before the other players.
